## FingerprintReader.enumerateDevices() method

Lists all connected fingerprint readers.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
enumerateDevices(): Promise<string[]>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<string[]>`

a promise to return a list of fingerprint reader names.
